subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: File uploading rules DO NOT UPLOAD WAV FILES
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0040_01C9D39E.7D84F9D0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I haven't checked out how you have the group files set up, so maybe this su=
ggestion won't help anything.

Maybe you could set up and Member's EVP fold=
er for people to upload their clips to with the understanding that their cl=
ips will only be stored temporarily. Then maybe monthly you could delete th=
e old clips.

The keepers like Stephan's could be stored in a different fol=
der, maybe labeled "Reference", or whatever.

I think it is nice to have th=
em handy on the group site for a while because links in posts get buried so=
 quickly.

April

----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Misty Dawn 
  To: E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 13, 2009 1:32 AM
  Subject: =
Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: File uploading rules DO NOT UPLOAD WAV FILES





       =
 If using esnips it has buddy list availability to add other members and yo=
u can post your link here when you update and upload new files.  The same g=
oes for storing it on any other file share site. Just post a link and let u=
s know when you upload new files. 

        I don't mean to seem anal but I=
 just went thru and cleaned out all the wav files and that alone took up mo=
re than 40% of our groups total space. For instance one member has posted a=
bout 10 files in mp3 format which didnt even equal 1/4 of the space taken u=
p by another members single wav format file. When it comes down to being 98=
% full you realize some changes have to be made and this is just one of the=
 many changes this group has had to make to allow more members to join us a=
nd have fair access.

        For those who are posting many files I sugges=
t you do the same because eventually it will come down to one of the mods a=
sking you to do so in order to clear some room. I like the idea of post now=
 then remove after a time period but the truth is that some peoples files n=
eed to remain without restraint such as Stefans who has been more than gene=
rous to post some files which may come in very handy for some of you to exp=
eriment with using his EVPmaker software. These files are for the group as =
a whole to make use of and they will not be deleted. 

        That being s=
aid, ask for help when you need it and feel free to share with people using=
 the best possible approach for the group as a whole rather than as an indi=
vidual. When there were only 5 of us here it wasnt a big deal, but once you=
 get past 500 it starts to take a toll and sacrifices must be made. Ive del=
eted alot of things I didnt wish to and had to ask alot of members who have=
 been around a very long time to help clear some space and they did so will=
ingly for the betterment of the group. They had some really great files too=
. Most now share them other ways including Sumption who started this group =
himself. 

        Misty



        --- On Wed, 5/13/09, SnowfireL@... =
<SnowfireL@...> wrote:


          From: SnowfireL@... <SnowfireL@a=
ol.com>
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: File uploading rules DO NOT UP=
LOAD WAV FILES
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Wednes=
day, May 13, 2009, 3:12 AM


          I have a question, how does anyone k=
now where to fine someone's files to hear them in esnips?  I can just keep =
them on my pc, or put them on the extra drive, or post then take them down =
each time, I've been getting some really cool stuff, now, there was a reall=
y funny one, this lady's voice came on and says, "are you ghost hunting." l=
ol I told her yes, I need them volunteers to help me clean up this house. M=
y ghosts so far are very nice, even one said "i love you." that was sweet. =
 Love them too. <s>

          In a message dated 5/13/2009 3:00:05 A.M. Ea=
stern Daylight Time, bulletbabea@ yahoo.com writes:



            LOL Snow=
fire! Nope it was not you this time. Others should read before they post be=
cause we just addressed this subject. Esnips is very easy to use it has two=
 uploading options in case you cant use the java application use the single=
 file uploader. Works a lot like email upload attachments.

            If =
you need more help just holler and I am sure one of us will be more than wi=
lling to help you figure it out. Posting from email as an attachment also w=
orks just not so well for the very large file sizes. There are many other f=
ile sharing storage places besides esnips. We just like the layout there an=
d the ability to share with friends including sharing storage space.

     =
       Misty

            --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, SnowfireL@.. . w=
rote:
            >
            > Well, it is not me, I took out the folder=
, and I removed the files, I can't 
            > figure out esnips, it say=
s it will take lots of files at once but, it 
            > never sends a c=
onnection, to upload anything.
            > 
            > 
            > =
In a message dated 5/13/2009 2:45:10 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time, 
         =
   > bulletbabea@ ... writes:
            > 
            > 
            > 
=
            > 
            > 
            > Ok I am getting tired of having=
 to say this especially twice in a couple 
            > days. Do not uploa=
d wav format files if you feel you must share it in wav 
            > form=
at then use esnips or another file sharing source. If newbies cant follow 
=
            > the groups rules then you will not be allowed to upload files=
 period. 
            > 
            > Everything will be deleted and you m=
ay reupload in proper formats and 
            > remember to respect the fa=
ct that this group of over 500 people has a limited 
            > amoyunt =
of file sharing space on yahoo. Only 100 megs split between 
            > =
everyone. that is why we work to get around our limitations by attaching fi=
les to 
            > posts via email attachment or using _http://www.esnip=
s. htt_ 
            > (http://www.esnips. com/) etcetera.
            >

           > Misty
